qa.name: Dr. Amelia Foster
qa.appearance: Disheveled, with wild gray hair and thick glasses

json_to_edit.voice_over: One key, infinite possibilities. The boundaries of reality were about to shatter.
json_to_edit.description: Dr. Amelia Foster discovers a mysterious key that opens portals to parallel worlds.
json_to_edit.name: The Quantum Key
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Dr. Foster unlocks a portal to parallel worlds using a mysterious key.

qa.action: A lone lighthouse stands against a raging storm, strange lights flickering from within.

hf.action: Dr. Foster's cluttered laboratory inside the lighthouse, filled with bizarre machinery.

tr.action: A peculiar, ornate key lying on a workbench, pulsing with an otherworldly glow.

xc.action: Dr. Foster approaches the key, her eyes wide with a mix of fear and excitement.

ka.action: Dr. Foster's trembling hand reaches for the key.

fn.action: As the key turns in an invisible lock, a swirling vortex of energy appears in the center of the lab.

af.action: Dr. Foster stumbles back as glimpses of alternate realities flicker within the portal.

qo.action: Dr. Foster's awe-struck expression reflected in her glasses, showing multiple realities.

edit_command: In shot 6, add a flock of glowing butterflies emerging from the portal

updated_json.voice_over: One key, infinite possibilities. The boundaries of reality were about to shatter.
updated_json.description: Dr. Amelia Foster discovers a mysterious key that opens portals to parallel worlds.
updated_json.name: The Quantum Key
updated_json.scene_summary: Dr. Foster unlocks a portal to parallel worlds using a mysterious key.

qa.action: A lone lighthouse stands against a raging storm, strange lights flickering from within.

hf.action: Dr. Foster's cluttered laboratory inside the lighthouse, filled with bizarre machinery.

tr.action: A peculiar, ornate key lying on a workbench, pulsing with an otherworldly glow.

xc.action: Dr. Foster approaches the key, her eyes wide with a mix of fear and excitement.

ka.action: Dr. Foster's trembling hand reaches for the key.

fn.sfx_keywords: whooshing wind, electrical surge, delicate flutter
fn.action: As the key turns in an invisible lock, a swirling vortex of energy appears in the center of the lab. A flock of glowing butterflies emerges from the portal, their luminescent wings casting ethereal patterns across the room.

af.action: Dr. Foster stumbles back as glimpses of alternate realities flicker within the portal.

qo.action: Dr. Foster's awe-struck expression reflected in her glasses, showing multiple realities.

label.rationale: we can enhance the visual spectacle and otherworldly nature of the portal opening by adding glowing butterflies to shot 6. this addition will create a beautiful and surreal element that emphasizes the magical and mysterious nature of the parallel worlds being revealed. the glowing butterflies will provide a stark contrast to the stormy, eerie atmosphere of the lighthouse laboratory, adding a touch of wonder and beauty to the scene. we'll update the action description for shot "fn" (shot 6) to include this new element, and adjust the sfx_keywords to reflect the sound of the butterflies' wings.

json_diff.value: whooshing wind, electrical surge, delicate flutter

As the key turns in an invisible lock, a swirling vortex of energy appears in the center of the lab. A flock of glowing butterflies emerges from the portal, their luminescent wings casting ethereal patterns across the room.
